name: blog-app
description: Full-stack blog application with React + Express + SQLite

scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.lint: npm run lint:server && npm run lint:client
scripts.lint:server: cd server && echo 'No linter configured' || true
scripts.lint:client: cd client && echo 'No linter configured' || true
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:server && npm run typecheck:client
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
